text: Does anyone have any idea how I can add a custom module to a blog template?
you can add it it in the blog listing or post template code
I want to add in blog list
you can add it in as a global group and then edit the global group
Any ideas why I would be getting this error with the default, hs-theme font load?

Hi <@U2H3TT8F2> Thanks for the reply. Apologies for my even later response. If I made adjustments or add features to the theme now, but do not adjust the ‘listing’ does that auto re-submit? I am not super clear on what constitutes a ‘resubmission’.

Hi there. Starting to build a theme for my work and I’m wondering if anyone can clear up whether it’s possible to disable or at least limit options for DnD section styles? I know I can set defaults in the template code, but content editors can overwrite these and when dragging in modules, new sections are created with standard defaults that can be edited…
Ideally I’d only like content editors to be able to select from present background colours (which sets a class on the container I can use to control child elements).
